verses.roman:
tāte vasi' āche sadā vrajendra-nandana
'śrī-govinda-deva' nāma sākṣāt madana

synonyms: tāte—on that throne; vasi'-sitting; āche—there is; sadā—always; vrajendra-nandana—the son of Mahārāja Nanda; śrī-govinda-deva—whose name is Govinda; nāma—name; sākṣāt—direct; madana—transcendental Cupid.
translation: On that throne sits the son of Nanda Mahārāja, Śrī Govindadeva, the transcendental Cupid.
